New Records: Cade Cunningham tied an NBA season-high in first-half assists, joining Nikola Jokic, James Harden, and Domantas Sabonis
Key Match Events: Cade Cunningham made the biggest play of the game on defense by blocking the final shot
Trae Young made a quick pass underneath the basket, leading to Cade Cunningham's game-saving block
Miscellaneous Highlights: Cade Cunningham had a triple-double with 22 points, 11 rebounds, and 13 assists
Cade Cunningham got his 3rd straight triple-double
Cade Cunningham was praised by NBA fans for his heroics in the epic Pistons win vs Hawks
